description: Define your own data request in actions for more flexibility.
label: Data API Request

options.name: type
options.label: Type
options.info: Defines your query startingpoint is one record or a collection.

options.name: filter
options.label: Filter
options.info: Filter based on Data API filter with variable options.
Variables to be used in the filter option.
options.label: Variables
options.name: filterVariables
skipInput
options.label: Skip
options.info: Defines amount of records which should be skipped to start your query. Can be any number from 0.

options.name: takeInput
options.label: Take
options.info: Defines how many records you want to query in total. Can be any number between 0 and 200.

options.name: recursive
options.label: Recursive
options.info: Defines if you want to query recursively through all records.

options.name: queryData
options.label: Query data
options.info: Query based on Data API query.

options.name: outputType
options.label: Output type
options.info: Defines your output: either data or the total count (when quering a collection).
